Package elevatorManager

Class ElevatorManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • elevatorManager.ElevatorManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    elevator.ElevatorObserver
    public class ElevatorManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements elevator.ElevatorObserver
    This component is responsible for handling all requests by the UserInteraction component. It has a queues for handling the requests by the UserInteraction component. Requests are handled while taking into consideration the priorities specified. This component is also responsible for handling emergencies.

      • handleEmergency

        public void handleEmergency()
        This method handles the emergency properly. It stops all elevators at nearest floor, and returns them to the ground floor.
